inn1.comm: Tuffey hits a good length straight away, pitches on middle and off stump, Hayden gets forward and blocks
whoa that's wide and going wider, that pitched way outside off stump, angling across Hayden and moved further away
Australia are away, Hayden leans forward and pushes it in front of point for a single
hits a good length outside off stump and shapes away from Jaques who lets it go
this one pitches just outside off stump and cuts away from Jaques who once again lets McCullum do the fielding

ah this time Tuffey bowls it a little wider outside off stump and moves it away from the left-hander, Jaques sees the width and chases the ball with the expansive drive, he misses and was lucky not to nick that
shorter length on off stump, Jaques moves back and dabs it behind point for his first run
Jaques chases another one that is wide outside off and moving further away from him, once again he gets beaten
Bond bowls a peach, that pitches on off stump and cuts away from Jaques who fends at it outside the off stump, the ball whizzes past the outside edge
this one is a little wider outside off stump and Jaques lets it go

Bond strikes, Jaques sees a short ball outside off stump moving away from him and decides to smash it, he goes on the back foot and reaches far out for the ball, the ball hits the toe end of the bat and spoons to Vettori at cover who takes the simplest of catches, perhaps the nerves got to Jaques
oh that's very wide, with the movement Bond is getting he can't afford to pitch it that far outside off stump
and another, far outside off stump
full toss on leg stump, Hayden should have dispatched that to the square leg fence but instead he hits it straight off his pads to Vincent at square leg
Bond gets his line right for the last ball, pitches just outside off stump and seams away, Hayden lets it go
Haddin gets off the mark in style, Tuffey bowls a full ball on middle and leg, Haddin plays it late and flicks it superbly through midwicket for the first boundary of the innings
and he times this one superbly through covers on the front foot, the outfield isn't the fastest
what's he trying here? Haddin charges Tuffey and tries to hit him down the ground, Tuffey bowls it slightly shorter and Haddin gets beaten
Tuffey slips down leg side and Haddin misses the flick, he'll get a  leg bye behind square leg
classy shot! Tuffey bowls it full on middle stump at 130kmh, Hayden leans forward and punches past mid-on and the ball canters to the fence
left alone outside the off stump

bowled him! Bond pitches that just outside off stump and the ball swings in a long way, Haddin tries to hit it through the off side and plays all around it, the ball blasts between bat and pad and smashes into the stumps
Bond fires it nearly in the blockhole, Hussey digs it out on the leg side
good length once again from Bond on off stump, Hussey gets forward and defends towards point
short of  a length this time, pitched on leg and middle and slanting across the left-hander, Hussey goes on the back foot and defends to the off side
a touch fuller on middle and off stump at 143 kmh, Hussey leans forward and defends towards cover
bang on a good length outside off stump and shaping away from Hussey who gets his front foot forward and lets it go through to the wicketkeeper
pitches outside off stump and moves away from Hayden who also lets it go
good length ball outside off stump, Tuffey is asking Hayden to reach out and play it, Hayden decides to leave it alone
pitches on leg stump and Hayden moves across and flicks it down to fine leg for a single
fullish length outside off stump, Hussey leans forward and drives to point, six dot balls to Hussey, rather uncharacteristic wouldn't you say?
pitches just short of  alength outside off stump, Hussey plays back and lets it go close to off stump
and he's away, Tuffey drops that a bit shorter on leg stump, Hussey jumps back and tucks it behind square on the leg side for a single
guided down to third man for a couple of runs, Hussey got a bit squared up on that occasion
good length ball pitching outside off stump and cutting away from Hussey who begins to play at it and then tries to pull his bat out of the way

outstanding from Bond! He's been moving everything away from the left hander but this time he cuts it back into Hussey with a  scrambled seam, Hussey lets it go and the ball almost shaves off stump, McCullum is also surprised by the movement and concedes a bye
fuller length and wider this time, Hayden chases it witha  big drive but gets beaten by the movement
this time Hayden chooses to let one that moves away from him go through to McCullum
short of a length pitching just outside leg stump, Hayden comes forwar dand tries to force it on the leg side, he gets hit on the pad, Bond appeals for leg before but Billy Bowden says nothing doing
left alone outside off stump
fuller length outside off stump, Hussey gets forward and defends towards cover
excellent line and length on middle and off stump, Hussey moves on the front foot and defends back to Tuffey
short of a length outside off stump, Hussey opens the face and runs it down to third man, Hussey is super quick between the wickets and calls for two, Gillespie's throw from the deep was poor
good length ball outside off stump, Hussey covers the line of the ball and lets it go
pitches just short of  a length on middle and off stump and pins Hussey on the back foot, defended back to the bowler
that pitches on off stump and bounces high, Hayden lifts his bat out of the way and lets it go over the off stump
low full toss outside off stump, Hayden gets forward and drives to play the cover drive but gets an inside edge towards midwicket
good length ball on off stump, Hayden pushes it on the front foot wide of mid-off for a single
fuller length on leg and middle, Hussey gets squared up by the away movement and gets an outside edge along the ground to third man
and we have lift off! Bond bowls that just short of  alength outside off stump, that bounced really sharply on Hayden who wisely chose to let it go
this one doesn't bounce as much but Hayden once again decides to shoulder arms
Tuffey pitches this on a good length outside off stump and brings it back into the left-hander, Hussey lets it go through to McCullum
Hussey moves on the back foot and defends towards cover
and again, Hussey is leaving balls uncomfortably close to off stump, Tuffey is getting the ball to shape back into the left-hander now, rather than just away from him
this one moves away from Hussey who gets his front foot across and lets it go
fuller length on leg and middle stump, Hussey plays it to midwicket on the front foot for  a single, he didn't time it well enough
Hayden steps down the pitch but Tuffey sees him coming and drops it a fraction shorter, Hayden ends up defending it on the leg side
pitches on a good length on off stump and moves a shade away from Hussey who lets it go once again
this time he plays at it but gets beaten by a beautiful delivery that pitches on middle and odd and seams away from Hussey, he was forced to play at that
this one is much quicker and it bends back into Hussey who initially comes forward and then has to hop back, the ball hits the inside edge and luckily for Hussey bounces past the stumps
Hussey watches one through to McCullum yet again
justa  touch fuller on off stump, Hussey pushes it towards mid-off and calls for the single, Vettori can't cut it off
short of  a length ball of middle and off pushing Hayden back, he jumps up and defends it down back to Bond

Tuffey drops it justa  little short, not that short mid you, Hussey gets back into position in a flash and plays a short-arm pull over midwicket, it was more of a clip that a pull, he didn't try to hit it too hard
Tuffey comes back well with one that pitches outside off stump and moves away from Hussey through to McCullum
straighter line this tim on off stump, Hussey leans forward and defends to cover
pushed to covers once again on the front foot
a shade on the fuller side on off stump, Hussey leans forward and plays it to cover once again
on a good length outside off stump, Hussey gets his foot to the pitch of the ball and drives ...to cover once more
Bond has been impeccable today, he pitches this on off stump and takes it away from Hayden who moves back and lets it go
Bond drops it on a shorter length and angles it away from Hayden who tries to pull but gets beaten comprehensively
this one pitches outside off stump, keeps a little lower than the others but moves away a great deal off the seam, Hayden lets it go
Bond gets closer to off stump but Hayden picks which side the ball is moving and shoulders arms
good length ball on middle and off stump, Hayden takes a step down and plays it back to Bond
good length once again outside off stump, Hayden tries to drives on the off side but mis-times it to midwicket instead
pitches on middle and off and bends back into Hussey who plays back and gets hit high on the pad, Oram appeals for leg before but that was too high
played off the pads to short fine leg
pitches far outside off stump and continues to move away from Hussey who decides not to play at it
good length ball on leg and middle stump, Hussey moves back in his crease and defends back to Oram
this one bounces a bit more on Hussey on of stump, he handles it well by playing it with soft hands down to third man
the frustration is getting to Hayden, he takes a step down the pitch and tries to wallop that down the ground, the ball moves away from him and misses the bat by a long way
pitches on leg and middle stump, Hussey gets forward and defends to the leg side
loud lodu appeal for lbw but that pitched outside leg stump even though it was going to hit middle, Hussey  tried to flick but missed it and got rapped on the pad
pitches short of a length outside off stump, Hussey lets this one go through to McCullum
fuller length on off stump, Hussey gets on to the front foot and plays it to mid-off
outstanding timing and placement, the ball wasn't poor at all, perhaps a touch too full, Hussey leans forward and carresses it through covers for four
this time he pushes it to the left of Jacob Oram at point and sets off for a sharp single, smart running
short of a length on leg stump, Hussey tucks it off his hips for a single to square leg
short of  alength again but outside off stump this time, Hayden runs it down to third man
excellent line and length bang on off stump, Hussey trusts the bounce and lets it go over the top of off stump
good leave, Hussey gets a stride in and lets it go close to off stump
a replay of the previous ball, Oram keeps it tight outside off stump and brings it back into Hussey just a  little, Hussey moves back and lets it go
this time he plays at it and gets beaten, lovely stuff from Oram, he moved that away from Hussey unlike the previous ones that came back in to him
fullish length on off stump, Hayden thumps it to cover off the front foot but Vincent moves quickly to his left and dives to save runs
Hayden tries to heave it down the ground once again but gets an inside edge to midwicket
Hayden tries to cut this one but it moves away from him and he gets beaten, he's really struggling to find his touch
well he's touched that! Hayden moves down the track and picks the full length ball, he swings that big bat of his and send sthe ball over midwicket even though he didn't time that perfectly
Hayden tries to cut again but it's too close to him, he gets a bottom edge on the off side for a single
Hussey judges it well and lets it go close to off stump
pitches outside leg stump and angles across Hayden, he tries to move acroos his stumps and play it to square leg but misses and gets hit on the pad
Hayden steps down the track once more but realises that he was in no position at all, he almost gave up on the shot half-way and Oram goes straight through him
Oram drops it a fraction short and Hayden cuts and cuts hard, he hits it straight to Taylor at point
good line and length outside off stump, Hayden shoulders arms and watches it bounce quite a lot through to the wicketkeeper
Hayden backs away towards the leg side to make room, Oram follows him and bowls it on the pads, Hayden flicks through midwicket
pitches on off stump, moves sharply away from Hussey and bounces high too, he lets it go
good length ball on leg and middle stump, Hayden gets forward and plays it back to the bowler
gone! Right after drinks! Gillespie bowls it a touch wider outside off stump, Hayden chases it and plays a half-drive/half-cut, he nicks it straight to Fleming at first slip who takes a simple catch
defended to point on the back foot
Gillespie fires in the yorker on off and middle stump, Hodge leans forward and digs it out on the off side
pitches on a good length outside off stump and cuts into Hodge who gets a stride in and shoulders arms
Hodge tries to defend on the front foot but gets an inside edge on to pad, Hussey sets off for the sharp single and how quick is he! Gillespie tires to kick it on to the stumps but Hussey was home
Oram floats it wide outside off stump, that was there for the cut shot if Hodge wanted but he chose not to play a shot
pitches on a good length outside off stump, Hodge lets it go again
in the tight channel outside off stump, Hodge defends towards cover point, Hussey is interested in the single but Hodge says no
defended towards cover on the back foot
Hodge gets forward and opens the face to play a good length ball down to third man
left alone outside the off stump, excellent tight bowling from Oram
fullish length swinging back into Hodge from outside off stump, he gets his foot outside the line and gets hit on the pad while trying to defend
in the channel outside off stump and this one goes straight through instead of swinging back into the right-hander, Hodge lets it go
shorter in length and angling into the hips, Hodge plays it towards midwicket and Hussey races through for the single
Gillespie asks the question but that pitched outside leg stump, Hussey moved forward and across and got hit high on the pad
defended to midwicket on the front foot
pitches outside off stump and moves away from Hussey who lets it go, that's the end of the Powerplays, New Zealand have given away just 48 in 20 overs, stunning effort
that cut back a long way into Hodge from outside off stump and hit Hodge high on the pad, he was on the back foot but it was too high
good length ball outside off stump that bounces sharply and goes straight through to McCullum
a touch too straight this time, Hodge moves across and dabs it to midwicket for a single
short of  alength ball angling away from Hussey, he moves forward and plays it down to third man, that's Australia's fifty, in the 21st over!
Hodge gets hit on the pad while pushing forward and Hussey sets off at frantic pace for a run
in a tight channel outside Hussey's off stump, left alone to McCullum
played down to fine leg for a single
good length ball on middle and off stump, Hussey gets on to the front foot and defends
fuller length on off stump, Hussey drives on the front foot towards cover where there is a small fumble, Hussey stands in the middle of the pitch asking Hodge if he wants the single, Hodge says no
pitches just outside leg stump and Hussey gets hit on the pad in front of middle stump as he moved forward, Gillespie roars an appeal but that pitched outside leg
beauty! Gillespie gets one to bounce very sharply from just outside off stump, Hussey gets on the back foot but gets betaen by the bounce
pushed towards point on the front foot, just the single off the over
short of a length ball just outside the off stump, defended on the front foot towards cover
good length once again, Hodge moves on to the front foot and pushes it to cover
pitches just outside off stump and holds it line, Hodge lifts his bat out of the way and lets it go to McCullum
this one jags back into Hodge from outside off stump, he gets cramped for room and plays it on the off side
pitches on off stump and drifts on to middle and leg stump, Hodge turns it off his pads for a single
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
pitches just outside off stump and goes straight through to McCullum, Hodge is happy to let it go
good length ball on off stump, giving Hodge nothing to work with whatsoever, he moves forward and defends towards cover
what a ripper, the effort ball bursts off a good length and takes Hodge by surprise, he fends at it and the ball whizzes past the edge
shorter in length and wider too, Hodge slaps it to deep backward point for single
good length ball angling across Hussey from over the wicket, Hussey lets it go, he has scored just one run in the last nine overs
tight line and length, this one came back into Hussey's middle stump from outside off, defended on the front foot towards cover
Oram sees Hodge coming down the pitch and bangs it in short, Hodge ends up fending it off his glove on to his thigh
Hussey steps down this time and Oram sees him coming again, he bowls it shorter and Hussey gets an inside edge to fine leg
pitches on off stump and moves away from Hussey who shoulders arms
Hussey advances down the pitch once more and decides not to play a shot at the last moment
Hussey tries to pull this time but the length is too full, it hurries on to Hussey who ends up hitting it in the air wide of Oram
good length and line outside off stump, Hussey moves his bat out of the way
short and wide from Gillespie, Hodge breaks the shackles by standing firm and cutting over point, that was a freebie from gillespie
defended to point on the back foot
a touch slower and on off stump, Hodge gets behind the line and defends on the off side
short of a length ball on off stump, Hodge has no option but to play back in his crease and defend with a straight bat, well he did have other options but this was most advisable
defended on the back foot back to Gillespie who's come back well after that poor first ball
fuller ball on off stump, Hodge leans forward and drives to cover, five dot balls after the boundary off the first
angling the ball into a good length from over the wicket, defended towards back ward point, Fleming has four men in the circle on the off side
Hussey tries to drive but gets an inside edge to short fine leg
dabbed to Vincent at midwicket for a sharp single
bowled flat and quick on off stump, Hodge plays back and defends
fuller and slower through the air this time, Hodge leans across and turns it wide of the man at short fine leg for a single
Hussey lets it go outside the off stump
loud appeal for lbw, Tuffey cuts that back off the seam a long way into Hodge who got outside the line of off stump and gets hit on the pad
fuller length on off and middle stump, Hodge closes the face and plays it to midwicket
defended to square leg of the back foot
full ball swinging into middle stump, Hodge moves forward and pushes it to mid on
Hodge comes down the track and tries to slog it over the off side, it was far too wide and Hodge had to reach out for it, he slashes and gets a thick edge to Vettori at third man
miserly line from Tuffey and the length isn't generous either, Hodge plays back and defends back to the bowler
Vettori drops it short and wide outside off stump, Hussey gets back and cuts straight to point, he'll be disappointed with that
driven to cover on the front foot
a long hop outside off stump, this time Hussey doesn't miss out, he moves back and cuts through cover point for four, poor ball
Hussey takes a step down to one that's flighted on off stump, he defends on the front foot
streaky stuff, Hussey came down the pitch again and was cramped for room, he plays a drive and the ball hits the edge and flies thorugh where first slip would have been
driven through point on the front foot for  a single
Hussey takes a step down again and tries to hit down the ground, he gets more of an inside edge to midwicket
good length ball on middle and off stump, Hussey drops it at his feet with soft hands and Hodge sets off for the single
short of  a length ball outside the off stump, it bounces sharply as well and Hodge lets it go
dropped! Full ball on off stump, Hodge gets forward and cover-drives on the up, he hits it in the air to McMillan at cover who dives forward, gets both hands to it, but can't hold on
worked off the pads through square leg for a single
Hussey charges again and lofts over mid-off, there's no one in the deep but he hasn't timed that well at all and the ball pulls up well short of the fence
short of a length ball on off stump, Hussey waits on the back foot and runs it down to third man
dabbed with soft hands towards cover for a sharp single, Hussey dives dramatically into his crease at the striker's end but he was home by a long way
defended to covers on the front foot
fuller length on off stump, Hussey leans forward and drives to mid-off
Styris fires one down leg side, Hodge moves across and tries to flick but misses, wide called
full and wide outside off stump, Hodge moves on to the front foot, frees his arms and thumps it through cover for four
Styris bowls this shorter on off stump, defended on the back foot to the off side
tossed up outside off stump, Hussey gets a long stride in and pushes through cover point for one
pitches on off stump, doesn't turn but bounces high, Hodge tries to cut but gets beaten

Fleming fumbles and then takes it! Hodge tries to cut once again and gets a thick edge on it, it flies quickly at stomach height to Fleming at first slip who doesn't take it cleanly at the first attempt, he manages to grab it as the ball bounces off his palms
White gets off the mark by pushing it off the back foot through cover point
beaten! Hussey moves forward and defends but the ball pitches outside off stump and goes straight through after beating the outside edge
defended on the off side on the front foot
full ball on leg stump, White leans forward and plays it to mid-on, he should have played that behind square on the leg side but was early on the shot
pushed to mid-off on the front foot
Styris hits the stumps at the bowler's end while delivering that and slips on to leg stump, White plays it behind square leg for two
full and in the blockhole, White defends on the front foot
short and wide outside off stump, White moves back and cuts to deep point
shot! Hussey is cashing in when he can, Styris bowls one short and Hussey plays another short arm pull over square leg, he played one earlier in his innings too, well-controlled shot
cut off the back foot to deep point for a single
tossed up slowly on off stump, Hussey is early in getting on the front foot and gets beaten
pushed through midwicket for a single, Vettori slipped on to middle and leg that time
too short and wide, White cuts to deep point for one more
slow ball and flighted through at under 80kmh, Hussey steps down and tries to hit on the leg side but was beaten in the flight
flatter and faster this time, Hussey tries to close the face and play it through square leg but misses
full ball on off stump, driven towards cover on the front foot
a touch shorter and White uses the width to play it late to short third man

big big wicket! McMillan bowls on a good length on off stump, Hussey goes for the drive and ends up hitting it on the up to Taylor at cover who dives forward to take a sharp catch, Fleming's decision to use McMillan pays off at once
full ball on the pads, clipped off his toes to midwicket
Dropped! McCullum was standing up to the stumps and couldn't hold on to an edge as Watson pushed forward and tried to defend
defended on the off side on the front foot
pushed through quickly on off stump, White pushes it to cover and takes a sharp single
floated through on off and middle stump, Watson gets forward and inside edges it on to the pad
defended on the front foot on the off side, that was much quicker at 97 kmh
slower this time at 84 kmh, Vettori is varying his pace cleverly, Watson defends on the front foot
defended to midwicket on the back foot
Australia finally reach 100 with a push off the pads through midwicket, it's been a real struggle
good length ball on off stump, defended on the front foot to the leg side
full and straight, Watson plants his foot forward and drives with a  straight bat back  to McMillan
defended solidly on the front foot to the off side
good length and a hint of swing back into the right-hander, Watson moves forward and defends to cover
a little too full on off and middle stump, driven down to long on for a single
a touch shorter and White plays that with a  flat bat from outside off stump down to long on
good length ball on off stump, driven to covers on the front foot
on the slower side - 135 kmh - on off and middle stump, White moves across and plays it to midwicket for a single
short of a length just outside off stump, Watson moves his foot forward and defends, the ball runs off a thick edge to third man
short of a length ball on middle and leg, nudged on the leg side for another single
fuller length from Bond on off stump, Watson plonks his foot forward and defends to cover
excellent over from bond, finishes up with a short of  a length ball on off and middle, Watson defends on the leg side
drifts down leg side, clipped off the pads to short fine leg for a single
tossed up on off and middle stump, Watson defends on the front foot
fuller ball drifting on to middle and leg, Waston hits it off his toes but straight to midwicket
slightly shorter this time, Watson cuts to deep point on the back foot
flighted delivery on off stump, White moves back in his crease and drives to the man on the cover fence
defended on the off side on the back foot

You will not see a better caught and bowled! Bond bowls a slower ball full to White who drives back at the bowler, the ball flies low and to the right of Bond who is going the other way on his follow through, he stretches out his right hand and picks up the ball inches off the ground, rolls over and holds on, absolutely stunning catch, pure reflexes!
defended on the back foot
left alone through to McCullum, Hogg sways out of the way of that short one
defended on the back foot to the off side
short of  a length and wide outside of fstump, Hogg cuts and cuts well, he beats the in field and gets four for that
clipped off his toes through square leg
tossed up on off stump, Watson moves forward and defends
fuller ball on off and middle, driven to mid-on off the front foot
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
Vettori bowls this from wide of the crease, defended on the off stump
he's going very wide of the crease to create an angle into the right-hander, defended on the front foot
closer to the stumps this time, Vettori bowls it slower and on off stump, Watson drives it back to him, Vettori finishes a maiden over
pushed off the back foot to point for a risky single, had Taylor hit from point, Hogg might have struggled
good length ball angling into Watson from over the wicket, Watson edges it down to third man off the back foot
good length ball cuts back into Watson's off stump, defended on the front foot towards cover
drifting on to middle and leg stump this time, played off the hips to fine leg
Oram drags that short and Hogg moves back to swat it away through square leg for a single
tight line and length on off stump, Watson gets pinned on the back foot and defends with a straight bat
pitches just outside off stump and spins into Hogg who plays it off the back foot back to the bowler
left alone outside the off stump
width offered outside off stump and Hogg cuts past point for a single
tossed up on off and middle, Watson charges down and takes it on the full, he drives past Vettori for the single
played to the man on the cover fence for one more

Bond takes the catch at long-off! Watson gives Vettori the charge and doesn't connect well, he gets a lot of height on it but not enough distance, Bond runs in from the fence at long-off and takes a well-judged catch
good length ball on off stump, Johnson plays back and defends on the off side
defended on the off side once again off the back foot
fuller length on off stump, Johnson plays back in his crease and pushes it towards cover
Oram is keeping it tight on off stump, Johnson once more plays it off the back foot back to the bowler
lovely ball, a bit quicker and fuller, pitching on off stump and cutting away from Johnson who tries to drive on the back foot and gets beaten
excellent shot! full ball on the pads and Johnson flicks it neatly off his toes over midwicket, he's timed that well enough to beat the dive on the fence
defended on the front foot to the off side
slightly shorter in length, cut off the back foot to point
flighted delivery on off stump, Johnson gets a stride in and defends
that was the straighter one and Johnson didn't pick it, he got an outside edge behind point
driven to deep cover for two more
tossed up delivery wide outside off stump, Hogg tries to go on the back foot and cut but gets beaten
pushed towards cover point on the back foot
dabbed short on the leg side for a sharp single, oops no, they decide against it
pitches on off stump and seams away from the left-hander who gets beaten, McCullum fumbles once, fumbles twice and then takes it
Johnson once again swishes at it outside the off stump and gets beaten
short of  a length on off stump, Johnson waits on the back foot and plays it to point
fuller ball on off and middle, Johnson pushes it down to long on for a single, Oram completes a fine spell, just 22 runs off his ten overs.
a touch too short on middle and off, Johnson swings it through midwicket for a single
the yorker fired into leg stump, Hogg backs away and pushes it to cover where Styris makes a fine save but can't prevent the single
Johnson tries to loft over cover and the ball hit the toe end of the bat and loops over Styris's head at cover
full and in the blockhole on leg stump once more, Hogg backs away and drives to long on for a single
Gillespie bowls a full toss outside off stump, Johnson lines it up and tries to send it out of the ground, he misses it completely and the ball passes close to off stump
and another one goes, Gillespie bowls a slower ball on leg stump, Johnson moves across and tries to flick, he gets a leading edge that lobs tamely to Oram running in from long-on
defended towards cover on the front foot
short of a length ball outside off stump, Bracken moves back in his crease and punches to cover
in the corridor outside off stump, Bracken moves back and lets it go
Bond lets a yorker rip, but it's a slower ball, Bracken backs away and tries to squeeze it on the off side, he misses and Bond hits the stumps, Australia are in shambles
full and straight, McGrath misses it and the ball almost shaves off stump
full toss on leg stump, McGrath tries to play it through square leg but gets a leading edge through point
full toss on middle and leg stump, Hogg backs away and hits it down to long on for one
Gillespie bowls a bouncer but it is mis-directed down leg side, wide called
short of a length ball on off stump, McGrath chops it down towards point
fuller ball on the pads, McGrath tries to flick but misses and gets hit on the pad
fuller ball on middle and leg, Hogg swings it to midwicket
full ball outside off stump, Hogg swats it down to long off for a single

slower ball on off stump, McGrath hits in hard into the ground and over the bowler, he runs one and the throw hits the stumps at the batsman's end, they run an over throw and since the stumps have already been broken, there's not much danger in going for the second
full toss outside off stump, Hogg smashes it and places it well through cover, he'll get four for that and Australia move closer to 150
a full toss above waist height, Hogg edges it in the air and down to third man, Taylor takes the catch at third man but it was a no-ball above waist
inside-edged to square leg for a single
Bond bowls the slower ball on middle stump, Hogg moves towards the off side and tries to run it past short fine leg, he misses and the ball hits wood, Bond finishes with five for 23

inn2.comm: hits a good length wide outside off stump and the ball seams sharply away from Vincent off the pitch, he lets it go
closer to the stumps this time, Vincent gets forward and dabs it to mid-off for a single, good sharp call
wonderful ball and well left by Fleming, that pitched just outside off stump and cut back into Fleming's off stump, he gets his front foot forward, judges the bounce well and lets it go
Fleming gets forward to one that is on a good length on off stump, he pushes it to covers and Vincent sets off in a flash for a single
excellent ball, that hit a good length just outside off stump and took off, Vincent prodded tentatively at it and got beaten by the bounce and the seam movement
drifts on to middle and leg, Vincent tucks it off his pads through midwicket for another very quick single
good length on off stump, angling across Vincent who gets forward and is hit on the pad
once again Vincent drops it short of mid-off with soft hands and Fleming responds superbly to his call for a single, the running has been alert so far
pitches on off and seams away from Fleming very late, he gets drawn into a front foot defence and the ball misses the edge
lovely stuff, a fraction slower than the previous ball but exactly the same line and length, Fleming once again tried to defend on the front foot but got beaten
Fleming takes a step down and tries to hoick it to square leg, he is early on the shot and the seam movement away from him induces the leading edge that flies high and safe over cover point
Fleming flashes outside the off stump and gets beaten once again, the wicketkeeper doesn't appeal but everyone esle asks the question
Dropped! Vincent hammers a fullish ball right back at McGrath, that was hit off the bottom of the bat and McGrath reached out to his left but couldn;t hold on
dabbed towards point for another quick single
pitches on a good length outside off stump and seams away from Vincent who lets it go

Vincent goes after McGrath, he picks the line outside off stump and although the length wasn't there to play the drive Vincent managed to loft it over mid-off, he didn't time that well and the ball trickles over the fence
pitches outside off stump and cuts back into Vincent who gets forward and pushes it towards point
smack, take that says Vincent! McGrath drops it a fraction short and Vincent pulls it high over mid-on, the ball reaches the boundary on just the one bounce, New Zealand have come out firing
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
pitches outside off stump and Fleming sees the width on offer and chases it, the ball moves away off the pitch and beats the expansive drive
lovely stuff from Bracken, that pitches on off stump, forcing Fleming to play at it, and them cuts away from him and beats the outside edge
this one comes in with the angle of the arm and Fleming moves across his stumps and gets hit on the pad
too full outside off stump from Bracken, Fleming gets on the front foot and pushes it in front of point, McGrath runs around from third man and does the fielding
good line and length on off stump, Fleming gets behind the ball and defends on the off side on the front foot
McGrath over-steps, Vincent gets forward and defends towards cover
hits a good line and length outside off stump, left alone by the batsman
fuller length outside the off stump, Vincent gets forward and opens the face of the bat to run it down to third man
pitches on middle and angles across towards Fleming's off stump, he gets on to the front foot and blocks towards mid-off
pitches wide outside off stump and moves further away from Fleming who shoulders arms
short of  alength ball and it bounces high on Fleming who stands on his toes and plays it down back to McGrath
pitches on off stump and seams away from Fleming who pushes at it and gets beaten
Vincent charges Bracken and lofts him over extra cover, he didn't make proper contact but the ball manages to fall safe out of Watson's reach
pitches on a good length and nips back into Vincent who gets hit on the pad
close call that, Fleming trying to leave a ball outside off stump but was very late in pulling his bat out of the way, the ball hits the bat and goes to Haddin on the bounce
good length ball angling into off and middle, Fleming leans across and gets hit on the pad
Bracken appeals confidently for lbw, that pitched outside off stump, Fleming walked across his stumps and got hit on the pad perhaps outside the line of off stump
Bracken drops it short and Fleming uses the room to free his arms and lash it over point, that bounces once before reaching the fence
played to point off the back foot
oh my my, that pitched on off stump and cut into Vincent, he let that go and the ball flies just over the top of middle stump, lucky leave or well-judged leave?
inside-edged down to fine leg for a single, Vincent was looking to hit that down the ground
brilliant from McGrath, he pitched that on a good length on off stump and drew Fleming out of his crease, he prodded at that and the ball seamed away from the bat
identical ball on off stump, this time Fleming lets it go outside the off stump
fuller length on middle and off stump, Fleming leans forward and forces it through midwicket, he's placed that well and will get two for it
Bracken pitches it on off stump and seams it away from Vincent a long way, Vincent lets that go, Bracken is getting tonnes of seam movement
this one is much straighter on off stump, Vincent gets on to the front foot and defends towards cover
this one pitches outside leg stump and goes on towards leg and middle, Vincent tries to defend and gets an inside edge on to pad
excellent length from Bracken, and the line is just outside off stump, Fleming moves forward and towards the ball but decides to let it go
that was just short of a length and close to off stump, Fleming moves back and even though there isn't much room, he manages to cut it wide of point for a single
Vincent defends on the front foot but an inside edge goes towards square leg for a single
Vincent backs away and tries to hit it through the off side, he gets a bottom edge to mid-on

Australia fluff a run-out chance, Vincent dabs it to point and sets off for a signle, Phil Jaques runs to his right, picks up, transfers the ball to his throwing hand, turns around and throws at the striker's end, the throw was poor and Haddin wasn't in position
left alone outside off stump
pitches outside off stump and seams back into Vincent who lets it go through to Haddin
this one moves away from Vincent who got on the front foot playing for theball that was coming back into him, the ball beats the edge and Vincent moves his bat out of the way as an afterthought
defended on the off side on the back foot
fullish ball on off stump angling into Fleming who gets forward and tries to drive but ends up inside-edging it to square leg
outstanding shot, Fleming gets forward to one that's a little shorter and crashes it through point, he's timed that well enough to get four
once again he dgets forward and plays the drive but hits it to cover this time
Fleming moves across his stumps and picks a full length ball from off stump and flicks it behind square on the leg side, excellent improvisation and that's four runs
full and wide outside off stump, Fleming gets forward and throws his bat at it, the ball hits the outside edge and flies high and over the third man fence! When you slash, slash hard.
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
good length ball on off stump, defended on the front foot towards cover
pitches short of  a length outside off stump and moves away from Vincent who lets it go
great line and length, just outside off stump and has Vincent in two minds, whether to play at it or not, he ends up doing a bit of both and gets beaten
drifts on to middle and leg, Vincent moves across and flicks it from middle to fine leg, Watson is very square on the fence and can't stop it from reaching the fence
defended towards cover on the front foot
that's not short and all but Vincent gets on to the back foot and pulls it wide of mid on for a single
defended on the leg side off the back foot
pitches on a good length on off stump, Vincent gets drawn forward and the ball moves sharply away off the surface and beats the outside edge
good length ball on off stump, Vincent pushes forward and gets hit on the pad while on the move, Bracken appeals for lbw but that was missing off stump
how did that miss off stump? It pitched on leg and middle, squared Vincent up and seamed away from him almost brushing the off stump
short of  a length ball on middle and off, Vincent gets forward and gets hit on the thigh
pitches on off stump, Vincent sees the length is fuller and tries to drive, he gets beaten by the seam movement away from him
full length ball on off and middle stump, Fleming gets forward and drives with a very straight bat, Johnson gets his hand to it or else that would have been four
the attempted yorker finishes as a half-volley on leg stump, Vincent flicks and connects well, he hits it to square leg
Vincent tries to flick again but gets hit on the pad for leg byes towards short fine leg
short of a length ball on middle and off stump, Vincent moves on to the front foot and defends on the off side
too full outside off stump, Vincent gets forward and hammers the off-drive, White runs to his left at mid-off, dives full length and saves three runs
short of  a length ball outside off stump, Fleming moves back and cuts past point
good length ball angling into Fleming's off stump from over the wicket, defended on the front foot towards point
and Bracken beats the edge, that pitches on off stump and shapes away from Fleming who prods forward, Australia need to hit the edge now
Fleming jumps down the track and lofts Bracken straight down the ground, that's gone very high in the air and it stops dead after bouncing in the outfield
good length ball outside the off stump, Felming leans across and plays it towards cover point
driven back to Bracken on the front foot, the ball hits the stumps at the non-striker's end but Vincent is in no danger
Fleming moves forward and across, trying to force it through the leg side, he gets beaten and the ball hits the pad outside the line of off stump
superb stroke from Vincent, he sees that it's full and wide and plays a controlled cover-drive perfectly through the infield for foure more, New Zealand are ticking along with ease
left alone outside the off stump
good length ball on middle and off stump, Vincent gets on to the front foot and nudges it to midwicket
whack! Stand and deliver! Vincent picks up the short length early and uses the room outside off stump to free his arms and blast it over covers for the second boundary in the over
defended to point on the front foot
he's going for broke now is Vincent! He plants his front foot forward and tries to hit that through the off side, the thick top edge flies down to third man
pitches on off and holds its line, Vincent pushes forward and plays it towards cover for a single
Watson strays on the fuller side and Fleming gets forward and drives with the full face of the bat to mid-off
Watson bowls it short this time and Fleming swivels and pulls it over midwicket, Hussey has a man out there on the fence
and the edge flies exactly where he would have been! Talk about bad luck! Vincent   edges it wide of Haddin and fine enough to reach the fence
Waston bowls this one full and on middle and off stump, Vincent stands his ground and hits through the line, it's timed with awesome power and the ball sails over the straight boundary
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
good length ball seaming away from Fleming who pushes tentatively at it and gets beaten
short of a length ball on off and middle, Fleming moves across and plays it to square leg
pitches on a good length and bounces high through to Haddin, Vincent judges the bounce well and lets it go
pitches outside off stump and moves wider away from Vincent who lets it go to Haddin

Australia are in shambles! Vincent tries to pull the ball but ends up sking it high in the air, no one calls for the catch and the ball falls safe in the region of short mid-on, unbelieveable stuff, Vincent had turned his back and was walking off because he thought he was a goner
he's smashed that, Johnson bowls a short ball and Vincent rocks on to the back foot and pulls it powerfully to the square leg fence
flicked through midwicket for a single
fullish ball on off stump, Vincent gets forward and drives to McGrath at mid-off for a single
good length ball angling across Fleming who gets forward and drives towards mid-on, the inside edge takes the ball through midwicket
Vincent reaches 50 by running a ball off the outside edge down to third man, he's been in superb nick ever since he replaced Astle in the team, Wellington cheers him on
defended towards cover on the back foot
short of a length delivery outside off stump, Fleming gets on to the front foot and realises he isn't in good position to play the drive, he takes the bottom hand off the bat and drives to mid-off
good length ball on off stump, Vincent gets on to the front foot and drives back to Johnson
pitches on a good length on off stump and angles away from the right-hander, left alone by Vincent
excellent line and length and superb running, Vincent plays that with soft hands towards mid-off and they complete the single easily
Fleming latches on to a short and wide one and drives firmly to cover
beaten outside the off stump, Johnson is generating good pace and appreciable movemnt but just not hitting the edge, and when he did find the top edge, no one called for the catch
short and wide outside the off stump, Fleming slashes and misses
full length outside the off stump, Vincent gets on to the front foot and drives tro mid-off
defended towards cover on the front foot
Vincent throws his bat at a fullish delivery outside off stump, he wanted to hit that down the ground but the ball hit the splice of the bat and flew to deep point
Fleming wanted to hit that over midwicket but changed his mind at the last moment and defended it towards cover
good length ball on off stump angling away from Fleming who pushes forward and gets beaten
full length ball on middle and off stump, Fleming moves forward and across and drives to mid-on
Johnson angles it wide outside Vincent's off stump, he tires to hit it through extra cover but mis-hits it to mid-off
Fleming gets on to the front foot and drives to cover, that was in the air but fell well short of the fielder
short of a length ball on off stump, Fleming gets forward and defends, he gets a thick bottom edge back past the stumps and Vincent calls him through for a single
dropped! Vincent slashes hard at one outside the off stump, the thick edge flies to the right of Haddin who dives with one hand, he gets to it well enough but the ball bounced off the glove
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
sublime stroke, Fleming leans forward and drives past the bowler, past mid-off and the ball speeds to the fence
pitches on off and angles into middle and leg stump, Vincent moves across and clips it through square leg for one
good length ball on off stump, Fleming gets forward and defends on the off side
Fleming pulls for six, he used Watson's pace and just swivelled and slammed it over the deep backward square leg fence
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
Fleming leans forward and lofts Watson over the off side for four, he reaches his fifty now, sorry I jumped the gun a little, thought he had got to fifty with that six! He's  played a superb knock
that one keeps a little low and Haddin collects it outside the off stump
pitches wide outside off stump and moves further away from Vincent who lets it go
in the channel outside off stump again, Vincent lets it go
much straighter this time on off and middle stump, pushed through midwicket on the front foot
Fleming creamed that back past the bowler, it hit the stumps at the bowler's end and the ball still bounces far enough for the batsmen to run three
left alone outside the off stump by Vincent
short and wide outside the off stump, too wide says Billy Bowden, Johnson is unhappy and that is indeed a harsh call
pitching on leg and middle, Vincent chips it to midwicket for a single to end the over
full ball on off stump, Vincent gets forward and drives through covers for a single
full toss on leg stump, Fleming gets forward and plays it wide of the man at short fine leg, he didn't time it well enough, he should have hit it for four
slips down leg side, wide called
defended on the front foot on the leg side
Fleming spots the tossed up delivery and heaves across the line, he beats the man at midwicket and once he's done that it's four all the way
driven down the ground to long on for one
fuller ball on off and middle, Fleming plays it through midwicket
whipped down to deep backward square leg for a single
short of a length ball on leg and middle, Vincent gets on to the front foot and defends to midwicket
Johnson bowls the bouncer and Vincent is late in getting out of the way, he leavs his bat sticking out and the ball  hits the edge and flies down to third man, he nearly got four for it
fuller ball on off stump, Fleming gets on to the front foot and drives to cover
full and on the pads, Fleming leans forward and clips it off his pads down to the fine leg fence, the proverbial bread and butter
defended on the front foot on the leg side
played fine down to fine leg for a couple of runs
bowled flat but slower through the air outside off stump, Vincent gets across and tries to flick but misses
driven down to long on for a single
Flemign comes down the pitch, takes the ball on the full and chips it in the air and in the gap at deep midwicket, that wasn't very well controlled but the placement was perfect
full ball on the pads, flicked to Hussey at midwicket
fuller length on middle and off stump, driven to midwicket on the front foot
Vincent smashes a short and wide ball through point for four more, just eight needed now
fuller length on middle and off stump, Vincent pushes it to mid-off and runs a quick single
drifts on to leg stump and Fleming clips it off his pads to deep backward square leg
Johnson fires in short and Vincent takes his eyes off the ball and turns his back on it, it thuds into his back
Vincent does it with panache! He picks a fullish delivery on off and middle and swings it over square leg for a flat and powerful six, New Zealand have hammered Australia
